name: zeno
description: Zeno Security Software - Metadata and License Specification

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && node scripts/sanitize_wasm.mjs && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run sync:artifacts
scripts.build:wasm: cd src/core && wasm-pack build --release --target web --out-dir pkg && wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs --out-dir pkg-node && cd ../.. && node scripts/sanitize_wasm.mjs
scripts.build:client: cd src/client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run sync:artifacts
scripts.build:server: esbuild src/server/src/index.ts --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/server/worker.js --external:cloudflare:* --external:./zeno.wasm --platform=node && cp src/core/pkg/zeno_core_bg.wasm dist/server/zeno.wasm && mkdir -p cloudflare && cp dist/server/worker.js cloudflare/ && cp dist/server/zeno.wasm cloudflare/ && node scripts/prepare_deploy.mjs
